max potion.description: Heals a creature to full HP.

ether.description: Restores 10 PP of a single move.

max ether.description: Restore the PP of a single move to full.

revive.description: Revives a fainted creature by 1/2 health.

max revive.description: Revives a fainted creature to full hp.

poke ball.description: A device for catching wild Creatures. It is thrown like a ball at the target.

great ball.description: A high-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a standard pokeball.

ultra ball.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

repel.description: Prevents weak wild creatures from appearing for 100 steps after its use.

super repel.description: Prevents weak wild creatures from appearing for 200 steps after its use.

max repel.description: Prevents weak wild creatures from appearing for 250 steps after its use.
